body_html:
can we change the attribute to something else, like _device?
I am thinking about which will be used more, and I think the device-mover will be used more rather than attribute.

I think the common pattern that'd emerge is:

device = "cpu"
if torch.cuda.is_available():
    device = "gpu:0"

my_tensor, my_labels = DataIterator(...)

my_tensor.device(device), my_labels.device(device)

i.e. the device movement call will be quite prevalent.
So reducing it's verbosity is important

body:
can we change the attribute to something else, like `_device`?
I am thinking about which will be used more, and I think the device-mover will be used more rather than attribute.

I think the common pattern that'd emerge is:

```
device = "cpu"
if torch.cuda.is_available():
    device = "gpu:0"

my_tensor, my_labels = DataIterator(...)

my_tensor.device(device), my_labels.device(device)
```

i.e. the device movement call will be quite prevalent.
So reducing it's verbosity is important
